attributes.action: Allow stop and search of cars on the grounds of excessive bass noise, taste in clothes, and wearing a hat inside a car.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We must suffer no more from cars parked outside our houses or behind us in traffic driving by an idiot wearing dubious casual wear and wearing a hat inside a covered vehicle playing Jungle or any bass orientated "music".
Confiscation of suitcase sized Bass bin must follow and hat confiscated.
I suggest confiscation and subsequent crushing of car and a ban from any owning a music playing device that plays louder than 2 watts per channel for 6 and a half years.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
